titleStmt.title: A more full and impartial account of the fight between the Dutch and the French, at Flerans. Sent in a letter by His Highness Prince Waldeck, which is as followeth. Dated at Brussels 3d. of July
titleStmt.author: Waldeck, Georg Friedrich, Graf von, 1620-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Roper at the Miter, next door to the Old Devil Tavern, Fleet-street, and Tho. Jones at the White Horse without Temple-barr,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the Miter, next door to the Old Devil Tavern
